revised_title: Analytical Techniques in Archaeometry: Advancements and Challenges
tldr: This article discusses the use of analytical techniques in archaeometry, focusing on the analysis of pottery, metals, and ceramics. The author highlights the importance of trace element analysis in determining the provenance and attribution of artifacts, as well as the challenges faced in sampling and analyzing various materials. The article also emphasizes the need for collaboration between archaeologists, historians, and scientists to develop more accurate and efficient methods for analyzing archaeological materials.
